markup_reference.title: You can attach any type of document to a card or page in Mingle by following these steps:

bullets.item: 1. When in full view of a card, click the Edit button and scroll down until you see Attachments.
2. Drag a file to the attachment container.
3. The file will automatically be saved once it's uploaded.

markup_reference.p: To remove an attachment, click the X to the right of the attachment name.

bullets.item: You can also add and remove attachments on cards and pages using the Mingle API.
You can delete attachments in both "Save" and "Edit" mode.
There is a 100 MB limit per file attachment. However, there is no limit as to how many or how big the total size of attachments are.
